title: The dog crusoe and his master
content:
The dog crusoe and his master R.M. Ballantyne The dog crusoe and his master Great book. Nice Western story shown by a different view with Crusoe the dog's viewpoint. You get to see a kid turn into a man and a great hunter and Crusoe is always by his siide.
Feel real terror when the characters are confronted by a grizzly. Feel real proud to see how much the main characters grow
